title: Super Chunky Slab Serif
content:
I love this super chunky slab serif in this vimeo animation. Anyone know what it could be?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803075401im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-08-13%20at%202_6411.59.16%20PM.png)

Heres a link to the full video:  
 [https://vimeo.com/31709818](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803075401/https:/vimeo.com/31709818 "https://vimeo.com/31709818")

Font: 

 Facebuster 

Solved By: 

 [defiantone](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803075401/http:/typophile.com/user/206966 "View user profile.")
author: robint

comments.content: It's [Facebuster](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803075401/http:/www.typetrust.com/font/facebuster). Found thorough: [http://www.fontshop.com/fontlist/genres/extra\_bold\_heavy\_slab\_serifs/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803075401/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/genres/extra_bold_heavy_slab_serifs/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fontlist/genres/extra\_bold\_heavy\_slab\_serifs/") which has many alternatives.
